data.actual_result: It still says "Voice Connected: [server name] / A"
data.expected_result: It should say "Voice Connected: [server name] / B"
data.short_description: When you are moved to a different VC, the client keeps information on the old VC
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel called "A"  - Have someone (or yourself) with Move permissions move you to another channel called "B"  - Observe the bottom bar
